title: @ohos.resourceschedule.backgroundProcessManager (后台子进程管控)
summary: Background Tasks Kit Resourceschedule 模块的 @ohos.resourceschedule.backgroundProcessManager (后台子进程管控)，提供相关接口和功能说明。

sections.title: backgroundProcessManager.setProcessPriority
sections.summary:
setProcessPriority(pid: number, priority: ProcessPriority): Promise<void>

设置子进程的压制档位，子进程被压制后

sections.title: backgroundProcessManager.resetProcessPriority
sections.summary:
resetProcessPriority(pid: number): Promise<void>

为子进程解压制，即子进程策略恢复为主进程调度策略。若主进程调度策略发生变化，如从后台切

sections.title: backgroundProcessManager.setPowerSaveMode<sup>20+</sup>
sections.summary:
setPowerSaveMode(pid: number, powerSaveMode: PowerSaveMode): Promise<void>

设置进程的能效模式，使用Promi
